actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of the civil service retirement system certain periods of service of civilian employees of nonappropriated fund positions in special services recreation and morale programs of the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Authorizes the inclusion as creditable service for purposes of the civil service retirement system, those periods of service of civilian employees of nonappropriated fund positions in special services recreation and morale programs of the Armed Forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of the civil service retirement system certain periods of service of civilian employees of nonappropriated fund positions in special services recreation and morale programs of the Armed Forces.
